content: मिल् {c6c} <ab>U.</ab> (मिलति-ते, generally मिलति; मिलित) {@--1@} To join, be united with, accompany; रुमण्वतो मिलितः <ls>Ratn. 4.</ls> {@--2@} To come or meet together, meet, gather, assemble; येचान्ये सुहृदः ममृद्धिसमये द्रव्याभिलाषाकुलास्ते सर्वत्र मिलंति <ls>H. 1. 210</ls>; याताः किं न मिलंति <ls>Amaru. 10</ls>; मिलितशिलीमुख &c. <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; स पात्रंसमितोऽन्यत्र भोजनान्मिलितो न यः <ls>Trik.</ls> {@--3@} To be mixed or united with, come in contact with; मिलिति तव तोयैर्मृगमदः <ls>G. L. 7.</ls> {@--4@} To meet or encounter (as in fighting); close, close with. {@--5@} To come to pass, happen. {@--6@} To embrace, clasp. {@--7@} To concur. {@--8@} To find, fall in with {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (मेलयति-ते) To bring together, assemble, convene.
